content: designed to use only one skein of sock yarn shearwater features short row-shaping relaxing garter stitch and a very simple and eye-catching lace border the result is a light crescent-shaped shawl that is perfect for summer quick and easy to knit the hardest part will be deciding which sock yarn to use **finished measurements** after blocking - 55 /140cm wide x 9 5 24 5cm deep
